description:
Would you like to end your day having actually accomplished more of what you set out to do?

We know you don't want to spend time you don't have learning how to get more time! With these concise videos you will:

  • discover how to schedule your time your way.
  • reduce distractions and interruptions.
  • improve concentration and focus.
  • remember important deadlines & appointments.
  • be on time for your mom's birthday dinner & your kid's school plays.
  • and most importantly, have more time for high priority â€“ high yield sales activities!

More Time More Sales Scheduling for Results gives you the tools to make short leaps toward more effective and focused days and weeks. See how blocking your time lets you see what time you have to spend on the things you need and want to do and how integrating your to do list into your calendar will ensure that you get those tasks done. Experience how much more gets accomplished, how much less slips through the cracks, and how your stress levels decrease. You will spend more of your time producing the specific outcomes that lead to more sales, and you will have more freedom and more time to spend doing the things you choose to do.

Results Based Scheduling contains:

  • 5 highly focused lectures
  • 4 useful calendar tips
  • downloadable resources, support materials and summaries.
  • a concise review and
  • a quiz to check your ability to use what you've learned

Why simply "manage" your time? Become a scheduling aficionado! Reclaim your sanity and countless hours in your week by using MTMS Scheduling for Results.
title: More Time More Sales: Scheduling for Results
